q1: Did Croatia ever win the World Cup?
a1: No. Croatia has never won a World Cup either as an independent nation or as a part of the team for Yugoslavia before their independence.
a2: Yes, they finished second place in 2018.
a3: You are correct that they did not win.
q4: Do you think Croatia can win UEFA Euro 2020?
a4: Probably not but I'd like to see them place well
